In the context of the movie 'Lakshmi' released in 2020, what significant event occurred in May 2019 regarding its production?

Options:
A. Teaser trailer
B. Official soundtrack
C. Titular poster

In the 2020 movie 'Lakshmi', what led Lawrence to quit the film?
Options:
A. He was unhappy with the script.
B. He did not receive any credit in the poster.
C. He had scheduling conflicts.
D. He wanted to pursue other projects.
Correct Answer: He did not receive any credit in the poster.
